00060 template <class Base>
00061 const IComponent* TSimComponentWrap<Base>::GetParentComponent(bool ownerOnly) const
00062 {
00063        if (ownerOnly){
00064               return NULL;
00065        }
00066        else{
00067               return const_cast<TSimComponentWrap<Base>* >(this);
00068        }
00069 }

00072 template <class Base>
00073 IComponent* TSimComponentWrap<Base>::GetSubcomponent(const std::string& componentId) const
00074 {
00075        BaseClass2::ComponentsMap::const_iterator iter = BaseClass2::m_componentsMap.find(componentId);
00076 
00077        if (iter != BaseClass2::m_componentsMap.end()){
00078               return iter->second;
00079        }
00080 
00081        return NULL;
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 template <class Base>
00086 IComponent* TSimComponentWrap<Base>::CreateSubcomponent(const std::string& componentId) const
00087 {
00088        FactoriesMap::const_iterator iter = m_factoriesMap.find(componentId);
00089        if (iter != m_factoriesMap.end()){
00090               I_ASSERT(iter->second != NULL);
00091 
00092               return iter->second->CreateInstance();
00093        }
00094 
00095        return NULL;
00096 }
